name: chrome-ext-cp-img-on-hover
description: A powerful Chrome extension that allows you to copy image tags and actual images by hovering over them and pressing Cmd+C (Mac) or Ctrl+C (Windows/Linux).

scripts.release: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && npx tsc --outDir dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp popup.html dist/ && cp popup.css dist/ && cp -R icons dist/
